mapper.select: select m.* from user_role as ur left join role as r on ur.role_id = r.role_id left join role_menu as rm on r.role_id = rm.role_id left join menu as m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id =#{userId} order by m.order_num asc
select m.* from role_menu as rm,menu as m where rm.menu_id = m.menu_id and rm.role_id =#{roleId} order by m.order_num asc
